detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Bitnext (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#542-604) has payable functions:
	 - Bitnext.constructor(string,string,uint8,uint256,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#556-564)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Bitnext](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#L542-L604) has payable functions:
	 - [Bitnext.constructor(string,string,uint8,uint256,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitnext.sol#L556-L564)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
